member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfPullToRefresh.XForms.iOS.SfCircleViewRenderer
member.summary: A class that contains the refresh content for the SfPullToRefresh to display the progress of animation when performing the pull to refresh action.

member.summary: In iOS arc calculated in Radians value

member.summary: flag used for Runtime refreshing (SfPullToRefresh.StartPulling())

member.summary: calculate the arc progress for identifying arc completion

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfPullToRefresh.XForms.iOS.SfCircleViewRenderer.isProgressArcVisiable
member.summary: isProgressArcVisiable flag used to check whether progress completed to 360 or not, if yes this flag value is false or it was true

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfPullToRefresh.XForms.iOS.SfCircleViewRenderer.isTouchUp
member.summary: mouseUp is set as true after touch up. based on this flag we have draw the arg after release the touch.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfPullToRefresh.XForms.iOS.SfPullToRefreshControlRenderer
member.summary: A refresh control that allows you to interact and refresh the view loaded in it. The SfPullToRefresh control allows you to refresh the view upon performing the pull to refresh action.

member.summary: canScroll flag will be work based on isScroll values. isScroll is true when view Y position not 0 , otherwise it was false
